title: Honoring Tim Morey for his work as a 911 dispatcher who supervised a baby's birth
fulltext:
LEGISLATIVE  RESOLUTION  honoring  Tim  Morey  for  his  work  as  a 911
dispatcher who supervised a baby's birth

WHEREAS, It is the sense of this Legislative Body to recognize that  the
quality  and  character of life in the communities across New York State
are reflective of the concerned and dedicated efforts of those  individ-
uals who would devote themselves to the welfare of the community and its
citizenry; and
  WHEREAS,  Attendant to such concern, and in full accord with its long-
standing traditions, this Legislative Body is justly proud to honor  Tim
Morey  for  his  work as a 911 dispatcher who supervised a baby's birth;
and
  WHEREAS, On February 20, 2010, Edwin Levy Sr. of Woodbourne called 911
to request urgent help because his wife, Stephanie, was ready to have  a
baby;  as  it turned out, the baby was closer to birth more quickly than
Edwin knew; while he was talking on the phone, the delivery started  and
there was no time to get to a hospital; and
  WHEREAS,  Tim  Morey, a 911 dispatcher who was on the other end of the
line, calmly told Edwin Levy how to proceed;  about  three  and  a  half
minutes later, a young Edwin Jr. was born; and
  WHEREAS,  Tim Morey was presented with a plaque and a pin, shaped like
a stork with a baby in its mouth; Mr. Morey was praised for staying calm
on the phone with the caller until EMS  arrived,  and  coaching  him  on
tying  the cord, clearing the baby's airway and keeping him warm; it was
a true success; and
  WHEREAS, Tim Morey's distinguished record merits the  recognition  and
respectful tribute of this Legislative Body; he is a true asset to soci-
ety; now, therefore, be it
  RESOLVED,  That  this  Legislative  Body pause in its deliberations to
honor Tim Morey for his work as a 911 dispatcher who supervised a baby's
birth; and be it further
  RESOLVED, That a copy of this Resolution, suitably engrossed, be tran-
smitted to Tim Morey.
